pageDescription: Enable, disable, and configure mods to customize your experience.
gettingStarted: Select your first mod to get started!
step1: Step 1: Enable and configure the mods you want to use from the list below.
step2: Step 2: Click the floating "Copy Code" button in the bottom right corner to copy the generated script to your clipboard.
step3: Step 3: In your SchoolMaker admin dashboard, navigate to Settings > Custom Code.
step4: Step 4: Paste the copied code into the text area labeled <head> Custom Code and save your changes. The mods will be active on your live school site.
whyContent: I created this tool to easily manage and share useful JavaScript snippets (mods) that customize the SchoolMaker platform. It simplifies the process of enabling, disabling, and configuring different features without having to manually edit code. I hope you find it as useful as I do!
generatedCodeDescription: This is the generated code for all enabled mods, ready to be copied.
copiedToClipboardDescription: You can now paste the code into your school.
copyFailedDescription: Could not copy code to clipboard.
configureDescription: Adjust the settings for this mod. Click save when you're done.
previewDescription: A preview of what this mod does. Close the modal when you're done.
footerDisclaimer: This app is not made by SchoolMaker and is not official. It's made with â™¥ by Anthony from the SchoolMaker Community.
fieldIsNumber: This field must be a number.
mod_transform-school-name_description: Removes the default uppercase styling from the school name in the navigation bar.
mod_programs-singular_description: Changes the plural 'Programmes' title to singular 'Programme' in the navigation.
mod_update-program-link_description: Updates the main 'Programs' navigation link to point to a specific program ID.
mod_ask-question-new-tab_description: Makes the 'Ask a question' button under lessons open in a new tab.
mod_sticky-sections_description: Makes the section headers in a program sticky to the top of the page when scrolling.
mod_course-card-customizer_description: Customize the appearance of the course cards on the programs page.
mod_course-card-customizer_config_cardTi: Only letters, numbers, spaces, hyphens, and exclamation marks are allowed.
mod_chapter-style-customizer_description: Customizes the appearance of a program's section groups (chapters) for better visual consistency.
